org.jikesrvm.util

Class Bits

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jikesrvm.util.Bits

  • public class Bits
extends Object
    Utilities for manipulating values at the bit-level.

      • fits

        public static boolean fits(long val,
                           int bits)
        Finds out whether a given signed value can be represented in a given number of bits.
        Parameters:
        val - the value to be represented
        bits - the number of bits to use.
        Returns:
        true if val can be encoded in bits.
